law.catch_line: An assignment or release of a vendor's lien may be made by the holder of the lien in the same manner...
law.text: An assignment or release of a vendor's lien may be made by the holder of the lien in the same manner prescribed for the short assignment or release of a mortgage. The holder of the lien also may write a release on the record in the office where the deed is recorded or the release may be endorsed on the original deed.
